courseDetailed.title: JavaScript
courseDetailed.description: The language for programming web pages
courseDetailed.example:
<button onclick="myFunction()">Click Me!</button>
<script>
	function myFunction() {
		let x = document.getElementById("demo");
		x.style.fontSize = "25px";
		x.style.color = "red";
	}
</script>
